Description:
What A Location!
Located on the ground floor in the Phillip Island Apartment complex is this stylish two-bedroom apartment that is beautifully positioned only 100m from the popular north facing Cowes Beach and the Cowes shopping precinct including some great cafes and restaurants. The architect designed complex boasts lovely gardens and an attractive pool area including a spa; ideal for all ages.
The apartment is offered fully furnished and features two good sized robed bedrooms, a bath with shower over, separate toilet a second separate shower and laundry.
The open plan kitchen, living and dining space, complimented by beautiful timber floors throughout, flows out onto a very private covered outdoor area. Enjoy all day sun all year round on the balcony; a perfect place to relax, unwind and entertain your guests.
For clever investors, this apartment is a fantastic occasional weekender, while still receiving an income from the holiday letting managed by Phillip Island Apartments. Alternatively, you can choose to have this wonderful apartment solely for your own use. The possibilities are endless!
This property for sale in Cowes, is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.
Insights: 25/9-11 Bass Avenue, Cowes VIC 3922 was last sold in 2019 and 8 other 2 bedroom house in Cowes have recently been sold.

Description:
The Ultimate Location!
On offer is this beautifully renovated weatherboard home, located in the heart of Cowes. The huge allotment boasts loads of potential to investors or those looking for a permanent residence within walking distance to the main street, shops, cafes, schools, doctors and all that Cowes has to offer.
The single storey home comprises three robed bedrooms, two bathrooms, an enormous central open plan living/kitchen/dining area complimented by electric oven and stove and laminate benchtops.
Other features include; polished timber and tile flooring throughout, combustion heater, split system heating and cooling and evaporative cooling, undercover entertainment deck, huge single lockup garage with plenty of accommodation for to store a boat or caravan.
All of this on a fully fenced 1303sqm approx. allotment. Inspection is by private appointment

Description:
Make Your Move
On offer is this beautifully presented, single level home, right in the heart of town. Being within walking distance to the primary school, shops, cafes, beaches and all of what Cowes has to offer, this home will appeal as a family home, holiday house or an investment property.
The brick home comprises of three spacious robed bedrooms, the master with walk in robe, beautiful bay window and full ensuite, main bathroom with separate toilet, laundry, living/sitting room and a large open plan living/kitchen/dining area complete with stone benchtops, dishwasher and electric cooktop and stove.
Out through the sliding doors is the partially covered extensive North facing entertaining deck which overlooks the thriving and tranquil gardens, the perfect setting to entertain.
Other features include; double electric lockup garage with rear access, accommodation for boat or caravan, polished timber floorboards and carpet throughout, solar power system, wood heater, split system heating and cooling, ceiling fans, northern and eastern natural light throughout, and access to the reserve at the rear of the property - perfect place for a walk or for the kids to play.
All of this within a 721sqm fully fenced allotment.
This property for sale in Cowes, is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
VENDOR SAYS SELL
Situated in the family friendly Shearwater Estate, this home offers low maintenance living at it's best.
Located within a short stroll from the Silverleaves Beach and Cowes Golf Course and approx a 10 minute walk to the town centre, you can enjoy all the restaurants, shops and cafes on offer.
Comprising of 4 bedrooms, the master with walk in robe & ensuite, main bathroom with a bath and open plan living, dining & kitchen which opens to an undercover alfresco area. A split system air conditioning unit and gas ducted heating provides year round comfort. The fully fenced backyard is child and pet friendly and has low maintenance gardens, perfect for any busy family.
This is a great opportunity to purchase in this popular Estate. Call our office today to arrange your inspection.

UNDER CONTRACT
It's all about location and this is certainly that! Located in a quiet court, right in the centre of town within easy walking distance to Cowes Primary School, Medical Centre, Shops, transport and restaurants. Complete with 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, spacious kitchen, dining and living area. Large yard which adjoins 3 acres of bush land.
Additional features include 22,500 water tank, solar panels, solar hot water with gas back up, outdoor fire pit area, vegetable gardens, fruit trees, tool shed & double glazing.

Description:
Amazing Water Views And Large 831sqm Approx Block!
This opulent architect designed, custom built 26sq (approx) four bedroom residence, has been cleverly arranged over three levels to make the most of its elevated position in the sought after Seagrove Estate, and to create exceptional water views of Westernport Bay.
A masterpiece of elegance, quality and modern style and only a few minutes walk to the shores of Cowes pristine north facing beaches and a short stroll to the local shops. This is Phillip Island at its finest with a lifestyle that simply cannot be surpassed.
Featuring four large bedrooms, all with built in robes and the master with full ensuite. Large bedroom windows allow for the flow of natural light.
Entering the home you are greeted with the open plan large entrance with three out of four bedrooms on this level with family bathroom, separate toilet and laundry. The ample storage is one of the well designed features of the home and would be perfect for all types of living. Permanent living, holiday home or set up perfectly to be used as a holiday rental property, of which the current owners are doing, whilst enjoying the home them self when it is not booked out.
On the top level you will be impressed with the outstanding water views, the open plan kitchen, meals, separate lounge and the master bedroom. The kitchen is fitted with the highest quality of modern appliances and enough storage to handle even the busiest entertainer. The large meals area will ensure your friends and family will be welcomed at any time and the lounge is spacious enough to allow for the whole family and friends to relax together, flowing out on the large L shape deck making the most of indoor and outdoor living.
Down stairs has on offer the third living area perfect for the kids to hide away and play, leading out to the rear yard with plenty of room to enjoy the outdoors. If that was not enough room for the family the Double garage is also there as there is plenty of room in the long drive for the cars, boats and caravans.
Other incredible features include high ceilings throughout, plantation shutters, stunning and durable timber floors, carpeted bedrooms, water tanks, fully landscaped and fenced 831sqm approx block for your privacy, and access to the reticulated gas system that Seagrove has available.
All the upgrades have been included in this high quality build so there is no need to want for anything more than what the house has on offer.
Inspection will not disappoint!
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.
Insights: 23 Water View Rise, Cowes VIC 3922 was last sold in 2019 and 56 other 4 bedroom house in Cowes have recently been sold.

Description:
In the Heart of Cowes
Set in a fabulous location, right in the heart of Cowes, is this North facing ground floor apartment.
Comprising spacious open plan living, kitchen and dining area, two generous sized robed bedrooms and main bathroom/laundry area.
With other great features including split system heating and cooling, shear & block out blinds, ample storage, electric cooking, stainless steel appliances to the kitchen, parking included and an undercover outdoor balcony; which flows off the main living space.
Offered fully furnished and within easy walking distance to the shops, cafes, restaurants and the beach, there is no better opportunity to secure your very own property that is currently managed by Phillip Island Apartments.
This property for sale in Cowes, is proudly present to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip island

Description:
BRAND NEW HOME ACROSS FROM THE PARK
Located in one of Phillip islands best estates Shearwater Estate just a short stroll to the Golf Course and Silverleave's Beach.
Approximately 420m2 the allotment is fully landscaped and fenced all you need to do is relax and enjoy your time here.
This new 4 bedroom home has been constructed by one of Melbourne's leading and most reputable builders. As you walk into this home you will instantly appreciate the abundance of space and the light, bright open feel resulting from the full northerly aspects of the kitchen, dining and main living area.
The spacious master bedroom is designed with a full walk in wardrobe and ensuite. The additional 3 large bedrooms gives you plenty of room for your family and friends.
In addition, the home provides a separate living zone which can be used as a living/ rumpus or entertainment room.
The open plan living space adjoins the large kitchen with stone bench tops and a 900mm stainless steel oven and cook top with a spacious walk in pantry. All of this opens up to a rear decked back alfresco perfect for enjoying your afternoons.
Walk out your door across the exposed aggregate avenue to the shearwater main reserve complete with play equipment, swings and spacious reserve perfect for kicking the football.
Call Alex Scott and staff today to arrange your inspection or find out about our next open for inspection.

Description:
Foreshore Living
You wouldn't believe that you could buy property on the foreshore in Cowes, with great bay views under $280,000! Well here it is!
This excellent apartment has fantastic bay views and fronts onto the Cowes beach and park area. Presenting a great opportunity for low maintenance coastal living it comes fully furnished and is ready to just move in and enjoy.
You won't need a car, listen to the waves lapping on the beach, walk to the restaurants, stroll to the shops or sit on the beach. Like to fish? The jetty is only a few metres away. The unit even has a spa Think this is romantic? Yes it is.
This apartment speaks for itself! Ideal investment for a holiday destination for yourself, or rent it out and enjoy a generous income.

VIEWS OF THE LAKE IN AWARD WINNING ESTATE

Beautifully presented, the home features four spacious bedrooms, master with en-suite, family bathroom, generous kitchen with freestanding stainless steel oven and island bench, open plan dining and living area which opens onto an alfresco area - the perfect space for entertaining!

Only a short stroll to the beach and centre of Cowes while providing access to the lakes, parks, bike tracks and gardens which are an award winning feature of the Seagrove Estate. Arrange your private inspection today.

Description:
Brand new and brilliant
This brand new home has been designed to relax and enjoy a coastal lifestyle. Never lived in, the impressive property comes with all the bells and whistles.
Upstairs comprises of an enormous open plan kitchen, living and dining area and convenient powder room. The living area extends through double sliding doors onto the spacious North facing balcony with views across the parklands and lake area. The master bedroom is situated to soak up the sun and includes a walk through wardrobe and ensuite will double basin.
The ground floor boasts a further three generous bedrooms all with built in robes, family bathroom with bath & shower, laundry facilities and additional powder room.
Additionally the home features split system heating and cooling, low maintenance landscaping, double carport and ample parking with plenty of room for your boat or caravan.
Just a short walk to the beautiful Red Rocks or Cowes beaches, this home is the perfect investment, holiday home or permanent residence for your family.

Description:
TITLED BLOCK CLOSE TO BEACH AND SHOPS
This fantastic block is located in the newest release of the prestigious Seagrove estate. The level 444m2 block is a corner allotment allowing separate access to the rear of the block, ideal for storing the boat, caravan or extra cars, a must when living close to the ocean.
Enjoy the first class amenities this estate provides including 3 parks, playground, walking tracks and scenic lake, as well as piped LPG gas to the block, the only estate on Phillip Island to provide this service. All services including NBN, mains and recycled class A water, sewer, power and LPG gas are available to the block with one concrete crossover already installed.
Located only 700 metres to Cowes boat ramp and North facing bay beaches and walking distance to the Cowes shopping centre and schools. Enquire today.

Description:
Make yourself at home!
Perfectly positioned in a quiet cul-de-sac offering the ideal permanent, holiday or investment property for those who are ready to enjoy all that the Island has to offer.
This single level hardiplank residence features a spacious open plan living, kitchen and dining area complete with cathedral ceilings and exposed beams, three bedrooms, main bathroom, laundry and storage room.
With a list of extras including split system heating and cooling, single carport, carpet and floating floors throughout, garden shed, full length front undercover verandah and a generous size North facing entertainment deck overlooking the low maintenance yard.
All of this is set within a 588sqm approx fully fenced allotment and is within walking distance to the beach, Whytesands park/BBQ facilities and a short drive to the Cowes shopping precinct.
This property for sale in Cowes, is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
An Exceptional Home In A Spectacular Setting!
This spectacular coastal property provides a superb opportunity for the astute buyer who values lifestyle, privacy and an exceptional home situated in an exquisite and highly sought after location just metres to the sparkling waters of the beautiful Red Rocks beach. A welcoming driveway winds it's way to the home with ample parking and storage available in the double garage and huge shed whilst the lush landscaped surrounds on this approximately 1989 square metre allotment offer a stunning backdrop to this recently renovated residence.
Architecturally designed, the home offers a fabulous floor plan with a central living area boasting soaring ceilings and plenty of glass to capture the northerly aspect of the home. The kitchen is beautifully appointed with a stylish and practical design complimented by contrasting cabinetry and superb finishes all overlooking the peaceful outdoor environment. From the central hub of the home, sliding doors lead out to a sun soaked north facing entertaining area, perfect for any time of the year.
The east wing of the home comprises the luxurious master bedroom including a gorgeous ensuite while the west wing offers three generous sized bedrooms and family bathroom, each positioned with lovely views of the garden.
Experience the charm of this fabulous home in it's magical setting; perfect as your permanent home or holiday retreat.
Other great features include a central feature wood fire, hydronic heating, stone bench tops, dishwasher, internal access from the garage.
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
YOUR COASTAL DREAM STARTS HERE
An exciting opportunity presents itself in this one owner coastal style home. The split level design provides separate living and sleeping zones perfect for families. You will be wowed when you enter the living area and immediately impressed by the horizon water views that engulf the bright, casual feel of this fantastic home. The indoor outdoor living is seamlessly brought together by double glazed floor to ceiling sliding doors and windows making entertaining so enjoyable. There are three good sized bedrooms all with built in robes, master with full ensuite. To fully embrace the lifestyle there is plenty of space to accommodate your boy toys. A large garage for at least 2 cars plus a double carport for boats and the like. A generous allotment also provides enough space for a caravan and still has room in the rear yard for the kids to play.
This is the epitome of island living, call today to inspect!
Call Vincent and Sandra for your free no obligation market appraisal today!
